section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: To raise the efficacy of the representation of coach travel sector political interests on a European level; to prevent and to review, taxation, fiscal and administrative burdens and discriminatory measures which directly effect the Coach Tourism sector; and to improve the image of our industry in the public realm
person_in_charge_of_eu_relations: Sandra van de Walle de Ghelcke
